detaileddescription.para: Time after which to disconnect, after waiting for a ping response (or inactivity).
Run the feeler connection loop once every 2 minutes.
Run the extra block-relay-only connection loop once every 5 minutes.
Maximum length of incoming protocol messages (no message over 4 MB is currently acceptable).
Maximum length of the user agent string in version message
Maximum number of automatic outgoing nodes over which we'll relay everything (blocks, tx, addrs, etc)
Maximum number of addnode outgoing nodes
Maximum number of block-relay-only outgoing connections
Maximum number of feeler connections
-listen default
The maximum number of peer connections to maintain.
The default for -maxuploadtarget. 0 = Unlimited
Default for blocks only
-peertimeout default
Number of file descriptors required for message capture
Interval for ASMap Health Check
Subversion as sent to the P2P network in version messages

memberdef.type: std::function< void(const CAddress &addr, const std::string &msg_type, std::span< const unsigned char > data, bool is_incoming)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<void(const CAddress& addr, const std::string& msg_type, std::span<const unsigned char> data, bool is_incoming)> CaptureMessage
memberdef.name: CaptureMessage

detaileddescription.para: Defaults to CaptureMessageToFile(), but can be overridden by unit tests.
Look up IP addresses from all interfaces on the machine and add them to the list of local addresses to self-advertise. The loopback interface is skipped.
Returns a local address that we should advertise to this peer.
vote for a local address
check whether a given address is potentially local
